title: Understanding the Galvanic Cell
text: In a galvanic cell, the anode is where oxidation occurs, and the cathode is where reduction occurs. Which electrode is gaining mass?

title: Oxidation and Reduction
text: Remember that oxidation involves the loss of electrons, and reduction involves the gain of electrons. Which process would cause an increase in mass?

title: Identifying the Cathode
text: Since the Co electrode is gaining mass, it is undergoing reduction. Therefore, it is the cathode.
